body: ## What happened When I tried to 'Open Flutter DevTools' in Tool > Flutter > Open Flutter DevTools, the exception in "Exception" section were reported and the message windows showed the Unhandled exception like following. ``` Unhandled exception: FileSystemException: Creation failed, path = '~' (OS Error: Read-only file system, errno = 30) #0 _Directory.createSync (dart:io/directory_impl.dart:133:7) #1 _Directory.createSync (dart:io/directory_impl.dart:128:16) #2 ForwardingDirectory.createSync (package:file/src/forwarding/forwarding_directory.dart:20:16) #3 ErrorHandlingDirectory.createSync. (package:flutter_tools/src/base/error_handling_io.dart:433:22) #4 _runSync (package:flutter_tools/src/base/error_handling_io.dart:597:14) #5 ErrorHandlingDirectory.createSync (package:flutter_tools/src/base/error_handling_io.dart:432:12) #6 new Config._common (package:flutter_tools/src/base/config.dart:76:17) #7 new Config (package:flutter_tools/src/base/config.dart:37:19) #8 runInContext. (package:flutter_tools/src/context_runner.dart:169:21) #9 AppContext._generateIfNecessary. (package:flutter_tools/src/base/context.dart:104:42) #10 _LinkedHashMapMixin.putIfAbsent (dart:collection-patch/compact_hash.dart:453:23) #11 AppContext._generateIfNecessary (package:flutter_tools/src/base/context.dart:92:20) #12 AppContext.get (package:flutter_tools/src/base/context.dart:121:32) #13 config (package:flutter_tools/src/globals_null_migrated.dart:56:30) #14 getBuildDirectory (package:flutter_tools/src/build_info.dart:766:48) #15 defaultDepfilePath (package:flutter_tools/src/bundle.dart:16:55) #16 new BuildBundleCommand (package:flutter_tools/src/commands/build_bundle.dart:28:21) #17 new BuildCommand (package:flutter_tools/src/commands/build.dart:36:20) #18 generateCommands (package:flutter_tools/executable.dart:150:3) #19 main. (package:flutter_tools/executable.dart:96:11) #20 run. (package:flutter_tools/runner.dart:48:13) #21 AppContext.run. (package:flutter_tools/src/base/context.dart:150:19) #22 main (package:flutter_tools/executable.dart:94:3) ``` And one more funny thing I want to mention is whenever I execute flutter command like ```flutter doctor``` or ```flutter run```, "~" (tilde) directory is created in the current directory, and it contains ```.config``` folder in it. ## Version information IntelliJ IDEA `2021.2.4` â€¢ Flutter plugin `io.flutter 63.3.3` â€¢ Dart plugin `212.5632` Flutter 2.8.1 â€¢ channel stable â€¢ https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git Framework â€¢ revision 77d935af4d (6 weeks ago) â€¢ 2021-12-16 08:37:33 -0800 Engine â€¢ revision 890a5fca2e Tools â€¢ Dart 2.15.1 ## Exception null ``` java.lang.Exception: pub activate of DevTools failed at io.flutter.run.daemon.DevToolsService.logExceptionAndComplete(DevToolsService.java:259) at io.flutter.run.daemon.DevToolsService.lambda$setUpWithPub$4(DevToolsService.java:175) at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniAcceptNow(CompletableFuture.java:753) at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniAcceptStage(CompletableFuture.java:731) at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.thenAccept(CompletableFuture.java:2108) at io.flutter.run.daemon.DevToolsService.setUpWithPub(DevToolsService.java:170) at io.flutter.run.daemon.DevToolsService.lambda$startServer$2(DevToolsService.java:113) at com.intellij.openapi.application.impl.ApplicationImpl$1.run(ApplicationImpl.java:265) at java.base/java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:515) at java.base/java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:264) at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1128) at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:628) at java.base/java.util.concurrent.Executors$PrivilegedThreadFactory$1$1.run(Executors.java:668) at java.base/java.util.concurrent.Executors$PrivilegedThreadFactory$1$1.run(Executors.java:665) at java.base/java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.base/java.util.concurrent.Executors$PrivilegedThreadFactory$1.run(Executors.java:665) at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:829) ``` ## Steps to Reproduce Just select 'Open Flutter DevTools' in Tool > Flutter > Open Flutter DevTools. ## Version info â†³ flutter doctor -v [âœ“] Flutter (Channel stable, 2.8.1, on macOS 12.2 21D49 darwin-x64, locale en-US) â€¢ Flutter version 2.8.1 at /Users/user_name/dev/flutter â€¢ Upstream repository https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git â€¢ Framework revision 77d935af4d (6 weeks ago), 2021-12-16 08:37:33 -0800 â€¢ Engine revision 890a5fca2e â€¢ Dart version 2.15.1 [âœ“] Android toolchain - develop for Android devices (Android SDK version 30.0.3) â€¢ Android SDK at /Users/user_name/Library/Android/sdk â€¢ Platform android-31, build-tools 30.0.3 â€¢ Java binary at: /Users/user_name/Applications/JetBrains Toolbox/apps/AndroidStudio/ch-0/211.7628.21.2111.8092744/Android Studio.app/Contents/jre/Contents/Home/bin/java â€¢ Java version OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 11.0.11+0-b60-7590822) â€¢ All Android licenses accepted. [âœ“] Xcode - develop for iOS and macOS (Xcode 13.2.1) â€¢ Xcode at /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer â€¢ CocoaPods version 1.11.2 [âœ“] Chrome - develop for the web â€¢ Chrome at /Applications/Google Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google Chrome [âœ“] Android Studio (version 2021.1) â€¢ Android Studio at /Users/user_name/Applications/JetBrains Toolbox/apps/AndroidStudio/ch-0/211.7628.21.2111.8092744/Android Studio.app/Contents â€¢ Flutter plugin can be installed from: ðŸ”¨ https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/9212-flutter â€¢ Dart plugin can be installed from: ðŸ”¨ https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/6351-dart â€¢ Java version OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 11.0.11+0-b60-7590822) [âœ“] IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate Edition (version 2021.2.4) â€¢ IntelliJ at /Users/user_name/Applications/JetBrains Toolbox/IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate.app â€¢ Flutter plugin version 63.3.3 â€¢ Dart plugin version 212.5632 [âœ“] IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate Edition (version 2021.2.4) â€¢ IntelliJ at /Users/user_name/Applications/JetBrains Toolbox/apps/IDEA-U/ch-0/212.5712.43/IntelliJ IDEA.app â€¢ Flutter plugin can be installed from: ðŸ”¨ https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/9212-flutter â€¢ Dart plugin can be installed from: ðŸ”¨ https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/6351-dart [âœ“] VS Code (version 1.63.2) â€¢ VS Code at /Applications/Visual Studio Code.app/Contents â€¢ Flutter extension version 3.32.0 [âœ“] Connected device (2 available) â€¢ sdk gphone x86 (mobile) â€¢ emulator-5554 â€¢ android-x86 â€¢ Android 11 (API 30) (emulator) â€¢ Chrome (web) â€¢ chrome â€¢ web-javascript â€¢ Google Chrome 97.0.4692.99 ! Error: iPhone is not connected. Xcode will continue when iPhone is connected. (code -13) â€¢ No issues found!

comment_data.body:
I found the cause of the problem.
Some zsh environment variable caused it.

title: FileSystemException: Creation failed, path = '~' (OS Error: Read-only file system, errno = 30) when selecting 'Open Flutter DevTools'
